member.name: CRYPT_SMART_CARD_ROOT_INFO
member.summary: The CRYPT_SMART_CARD_ROOT_INFO structure contains the smart card and session IDs associated with a certificate context. The certificate propagation service uses this structure to transfer smart card data between a smart card and a virtual root certificate store on a computer.

member.name: CRYPT_SMART_CARD_ROOT_INFO.rgbCardID
member.summary: An array of bytes that specify the smart card IDs retrieved by using the function with the dwParam parameter set to PP_SMARTCARD_GUID.

member.name: CRYPT_SMART_CARD_ROOT_INFO.luid
member.summary: A structure that specifies a session authentication ID from an access token.
